page.title: 16RECREATION IN SELSEY
page.content: There are many leisure activities for the people of Selsey. The Golf Club has a nine hole course, two tennis courts and a putting green for its members, which number almost 300. The Cricket Club has been running for 150 years and has a membership of 100. The Football Club is situated next door to the Cricket Club and is also thriving. The Tennis and Bowling Club offers both hard and grass courts as well as a forty yard square bowling green. All of these afore_mentioned facilities are privately run. The Manhood Community Centre offers badminton, basket ball and netball, karate. Fishing is allowed in the harbour where one can find bass, mullet and plaice. There are always swimming and other sea sports.
